content:
TITLE: Cloning Bot Repository with Git
DESCRIPTION: Git command to clone the bot repository, including the --recursive flag to ensure all submodules are also cloned.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/ares-sc2-bot-template/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone --recursive <your_git_repo_home_url_here>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies with Poetry
DESCRIPTION: Poetry command to install dependencies, compile Cython, and create a new isolated virtual environment for the bot.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/ares-sc2-bot-template/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
poetry install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Bot with Python
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the bot using Poetry and Python, executing the run.py script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/ares-sc2-bot-template/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
poetry run python run.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Git Submodules
DESCRIPTION: Git commands to update and initialize submodules, specifically for resolving missing Ares-SC2 package issues.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/ares-sc2-bot-template/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git submodule update --init
git submodule update --init --recursive --remote
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Ares-SC2 Framework
DESCRIPTION: Python command to update the Ares-SC2 framework using a provided script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/ares-sc2-bot-template/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python scripts/update_ares.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Environment Variables for Linux (Lutris) in Shell
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set environment variables for Ares-SC2 to interact with StarCraft II installed via Lutris on Linux. These variables include SC2PF, SC2PATH, and WINE.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/ares-sc2-bot-template/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
export SC2PF=WineLinux
export SC2PATH="/home/`(username)`/Games/battlenet/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/StarCraft II/"
export WINE="/home/`(username)`/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/`(version of wine)`/bin/wine"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Poetry on Linux
DESCRIPTION: Curl command to install Poetry on a Linux system using the official installation script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/ares-sc2-bot-template/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
curl -sSL https://install.python-poetry.org | python3 -
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Formatting Code with Black and isort
DESCRIPTION: Commands to format Python code using Black and isort tools for consistent code style.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/ares-sc2-bot-template/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
black .
isort .
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Navigating to Bot Directory in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Bash command to change the current directory to the bot's root folder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/ares-sc2-bot-template/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd <bot_folder>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Verifying Poetry Installation
DESCRIPTION: Command to check the installed version of Poetry, confirming successful installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/ares-sc2-bot-template/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
poetry --version
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Checking Python Version on Linux
DESCRIPTION: Command to check the installed Python version on a Linux system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/ares-sc2-bot-template/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python3 --version
```
